description.p: XPacman is a simple Pacman game clone for the X Window System.

This is a basic version of pacman. It concentrates on the essentials of the game for now, meaning many original features are absent (ie no scores, no fruit, no special items, no lives). When all pills are cleared from a level, the difficulty level is notched up, and a new level is generated. If you collide with a ghost, all pills are replaced, and you restart the current level from scratch. A new feature just added is the presence of large red pills that for a short time turn the ghosts grey and let you eat them.
